statements.__comment: Create ASSUMES_ROLE realtionship from ec2 instance to the associated iaminstance iam role
statements.query:
MATCH (aa:AWSAccount)-[:RESOURCE]->(i:EC2Instance)
WITH SPLIT(i.iaminstanceprofile, '/')[-1] AS role_name, aa, i
MATCH (aa)-[:RESOURCE]->(r:AWSRole)
WHERE r.arn ENDS WITH role_name
MERGE (i)-[:ASSUMES_ROLE]->(r)
